```{r}
x_vect <- seq(12, 2, -2)
print(x_vect)
X <- matrix(x_vect, 2, 3)

Y <- matrix(seq(1,4,1), 2, 2)
print(Y)
Z <- matrix(seq(4,10,2), 2, 2)
print(Z)
Yt <- t(Y)
print(Yt)
Zt <- t(Z)
print(Zt)

Y+Z
Z+Y
Y*Z

Y %*% Z
Z %*% Y

Y %*% X

# X %*% Y

solve(Y)

solve(Y) %*% Y

solve(Y) %*% X

solve(Y, X)

```
